welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Alexa Movie-Info. Please ask tell about movieName to know about movie information.
responseMessage: Do you want to know about other movie?

yesMessage: Please ask tell about moviename to know about movie information

helpMessage: You can say open movie information to me!
